title: Repsonsive Art

images.alt: A figure styled to look like framed art hanging on a wall. The canvas contains a variety of shapes—squares, quarter circles, half circles—in shades of green, aubergine, and cream

description:
![A figure styled to look like framed art hanging on a wall. The canvas contains a variety of shapes—squares, quarter circles, half circles—in shades of green, aubergine, and cream](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3238096/160153697-2d471c30-8eec-4414-bdc8-33d755fec303.jpeg)

> Art experiments that embrace the cascading nature of CSS and the responsiveness of the web, falling somewhere between handcrafted and generative art.
